comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
@xtqqczze Sorry for the delay. I reviewed the changes again today, and think the pattern change may not be really necessary. Even .NET code base is not consistent on this pattern, see https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/blob/57bfe474518ab5b7cfe6bf7424a79ce3af9d6657/src/libraries/Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel/src/Library.cs#L43-L54.

But other maintainers may have different opinions, so I marked this PR to be reviewed by maintainers and will see what other folks think.

If we use the new pattern I'd suggest to use named arguments to make the code more readable.
